entry.title: Wednesday night: Periods of light snow. Low minus 36. POP 30%
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. 30 percent chance of light snow this evening. Clearing before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 36. Wind chill minus 27 this evening and minus 42 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday: Sunny. High minus 19.
entry.summary: Sunny. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 19. Wind chill minus 42 in the morning and minus 23 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Wednesday 22 February 2023

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 26 with temperature rising to minus 20 by morning.
